hero.title: Gustav Schwarzbach
hero.subtitle: Media Informatics Student & Creative Developer
description: I am a Media Informatics student currently in my 4th semester at HTW Dresden, passionate about game design and cybersecurity in the context of games.
I love learning programming – right now I'm especially focused on C#, and I've already worked with C, C++, Java, and Processing.

I enjoy creating projects that blend creativity and logic – from developing a voice- and hand-controlled game in Processing to designing 3D models and UI concepts using Blender, Photoshop, and Illustrator.
I'm currently open to internships, working student positions, and collaborative opportunities in tech and design fields.
